list_definition.definition: a (usually luxurious) flat at the top of a building

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: That apartment building has a beautiful penthouse

list_ex_of_english: Third floor 'penthouse' rooms overlook a roof garden above this bay.
Use of the drug has spread from the penthouse to the street.
Of course there are one or two penthouses there, but we did not build them; they have nothing to do with us.
